Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பொய்யாமை அன்ன புகழில்லை எய்யாமைஎல்லா அறமுந் தரும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: There is no praise like the praise of never uttering a falsehood: without causing any suffering, it will lead to every virtue.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person stands, their entire being defined by the virtue of truthfulness ('பொய்யாமை'). From them emanates a magnificent, unparalleled aura of pure, white light, representing the greatest 'praise' or 'glory' ('புகழ்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: This single virtue of truthfulness is shown to be a fertile source. From the person's feet, a beautiful garden representing 'all virtues' ('எல்லா அறமும்') effortlessly grows and blossoms, without any other toil or effort from the person ('எய்யாமை').
Layered_Composition.Background: The scene is one of effortless abundance and supreme glory, all originating from the single, foundational virtue of truthfulness.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Truthfulness is the single greatest glory, and it is a foundational virtue that effortlessly gives rise to all other virtues without causing any strain.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: Truthfulness as the 'mother virtue' that gives birth to all others is the central concept. The effortless ('எய்யாமை') growth of the garden shows that other virtues are a natural consequence of truthfulness, not separate struggles.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Supreme glory, foundational, effortless virtue, abundant.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A brilliant, pure, white light of praise emanates from the truthful person. The garden of virtues is filled with vibrant, harmonious colors. The entire scene is luminous and positive.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, heroic shot that captures the person, their supreme aura of praise, and the beautiful garden of virtues that springs from them.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with magical realism effects for the aura and the growing garden.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The person's truthfulness is the source of all light and color in the image.

Cultural_Anchors: No praise like truthfulness (பொய்யாமை அன்ன புகழ் இல்லை)
It gives all virtues without strain (எய்யாமை எல்லா அறமும் தரும்)
